General.Name: Shenzhen Pacific Union Precision Manufacturing Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shenzhen Pacific Union Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. engages in the design, research and development, production, and sale of the structural parts of metal products in China. The company's products are used in mobile phones, computers, medical devices, automobiles, and other application areas. It is also involved in exporting activities. Shenzhen Pacific Union Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. was founded in 2015 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
